body.name: Graco Extend2Fit 3-in-1 Car Seat, Stocklyn & SnugRide Lite Infant Car Seat Base (SnugRide Lite)
deliveryMessages: Delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 20 mins
features: Product 1: 3 car seats in 1 – Rear-facing for infants 4-50 pounds | Front-facing for toddlers 22-65 pounds and for big kids 30-100 pounds
Product 1: Made of Steel reinforced | Product dimensions – 20.75” D x 19” W x 24.5” H | Product weight – 19.25 lbs.

Product 1: 4-position extension panel adjusts to provide 5 inches of additional legroom, allowing your child to ride safely rear facing longer | 6-position recline helps keep your child comfy | 10-position headrest adjusts easily for your growing child
Product 1: Simply Safe Adjust Harness System adjusts the height of your harness and headrest in one motion to ensure that your child is always properly secured
Product 2: 4-position adjustable base helps ensure an accurate install and helps keep baby comfortable as he or she grows
Product 2: Easy-to-read level indicator helps eliminate guesswork from the installation process, so you can feel confident it’s installed correctly
Product 2: Compatible with current Graco Infant car seat models. Easy installation of stay-in-car base using LATCH system

Product 2: Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures
body.description: Graco Extend2Fit 3-in-1 Car Seat, StocklynThe Graco Extend2Fit 3-in-1 Car Seat features a 4-position extension panel that provides up to 5” of extra rear-facing legroom, allowing your child to ride safely rear-facing longer. Children are safer riding rear-facing and should ride rear-facing as long as possible, until they reach the maximum rear-facing height or weight rating for their car seat. The adjustable extension panel and 50 lb rear-facing weight limit allow the seat to grow with your child in rear-facing mode, providing extended rear-facing use. This seat offers 3 modes of use to grow with your child from rear-facing harness (4-50 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb). The seat features the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, which allows you to adjust the height of the harness and headrest in one motion, and InRight LATCH for a one-second LATCH attachment. Harnessing is made easier with fuss-free harness storage pockets that conveniently hold the harness out of the way while getting baby in and out of the car seat.Graco SnugRide Lite Infant Car Seat Base (SnugRide Lite)If you have more than one car, consider an extra infant car seat base for seamless transitions. Leave your base permanently installed in your car and keep your other base for dad or grandma's car. The Graco SnugRide Lite Infant Car Seat Base features 4-position adjust and easy-to-read level indicator to help ensure an accurate install. This base pairs perfectly with any Graco Infant Car Seat through a one-step secure attachment. It is Graco ProtectPlus Engineered to help protect in frontal, side, rear, and rollover crashes, providing extra peace of mind about your little one's safety.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco Extend2Fit 3-in-1 Car Seat The Graco Extend2Fit 3-in-1 Car Seat features a 4-position extension panel that provides up to 5” of extra rear-facing legroom, allowing your child to safely ride rear-facing longer. Children are safer riding rear-facing and should ride rear-facing as long as possible, until they reach the maximum rear-facing height or weight rating for their car seat. With Extend2Fit, the adjustable extension panel and 50 lb rear-facing weight limit allow the seat to grow with your child in rear-facing mode, providing extended rear-facing use. This seat offers 3 modes of use to grow with your child from rear-facing harness (4-50 lb) to forward-facing harness (22-65 lb) to highback booster (40-100 lb). The Perfect Car Seat for… Parents looking for a 3-in-1 car seat to grow with their child Parents who want their child to ride rear-facing longer, up to 50 lb

Features to Love Ride Rear-Facing Longer The 4-position extension panel adjusts to provide up to 5 inches of additional legroom, allowing your child to safely ride rear-facing longer. ProtectPlus Engineered This combination of the most rigorous crash tests helps to protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes. 10-Position Headrest Choose the perfect headrest height from 10 positions to get the safest fit for your child as they grow. No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness Adjust the height of your harness and headrest in one motion with the No-Rethread Simply Safe Adjust Harness System to ensure your child is always properly secured.

Graco SnugRide Lite Infant Car Seat Base If you have more than one car, consider an extra infant car seat base for seamless transitions. Leave your base permanently installed in your car and keep your other base for dad or grandma's car. The Graco SnugRide Lite Infant Car Seat Base features a 4-position adjustable base and easy-to-read level indicator to help ensure an accurate install. This base pairs perfectly with any Graco Infant Car Seat through a one-step secure attachment. An Extra Base is Great For: Your second car or another caregiver's vehicle (grandma, dad, babysitter) Easy transitions between cars without reinstalling Parents who own any Graco Infant Car Seat—it will seamlessly connect with this base
